explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning algorithms to predict acute kidney injury in sepsis patients.
explanations.supervised learning: The study uses labeled data to train predictive models, which is characteristic of supervised learning.
explanations.classification: The task of predicting whether a patient will develop AKI is a classification problem.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper lists SVM as one of the machine learning algorithms used in the study.
explanations.SVM: Abbreviation for Support Vector Machine, which is mentioned in the paper.
explanations.decision tree: The paper mentions Decision Tree (DT) as one of the algorithms used.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions Artificial Neural Network (ANN) as one of the algorithms used.
